Package popt4jlib.SA

Simulated Annealing Algorithms Parallel Implementation.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SAScheduleIntf
    defines the contract for a temperature cooling schedule -primarily depending on the outer-most iteration number of the SA process, but also possibly on other parameters and/or variable values that may be passed via the HashMap second argument of the main method of the interface.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BoltzmanSchedule
    an implementation of the SAScheduleIntf that follows so-called Boltzman-Annealing schedule (very slow temperature decrease).
    CauchySchedule
    an implementation of the SAScheduleIntf that follows so-called Cauchy-Annealing schedule.
    DblArray1CMaker
    implements the operator for creating random chromosome objects that are of type double[].
    DblArray1MoveMaker
    specifies how to make a move from one position to the next, when "positions" are double[] objects.
    DSA
    The DSA class implements a parallel Simulated Annealing algorithm for the minimization of a function to be passed in as argument object implementing the FunctionIntf argument of the minimize(f) method.
    DSAIndividual
    auxiliary class, not part of the public API.
    DSAThread
    auxiliary class not part of the public API.
    DSAThreadAux
    auxiliary class not part of the public API
    ExpDecSchedule
    an implementation of the SAScheduleIntf that follows the so-called exponential-decrease schedule (for an application of this schedule, see Gregoriou (ed.), "Handbook of Trading: Strategies for Navigating and Profiting in Currency, Bond and Stock Markets", McGraw-Hill, 2010).
    IntVarArray1CMaker
    implements the operator for creating variable-length random chromosome objects that are of type int[].
    IntVarArray1MoveMaker
    specifies how to make a move from one position to the next, when "positions" are int[] objects of varying length.
    LinScaleSchedule
    an implementation of the SAScheduleIntf that is based on a step-function linear cooling schedule (the temperature remains the same for a fixed number of iterations, and then drops linearly to the next value.)

Package popt4jlib.SA Description

Simulated Annealing Algorithms Parallel Implementation.
